div.p: RUSHMORE AND BADLANDS. >>> FINALLY THE FACTOR TIP OF
THE DAY. AS YOU MAY KNOW, MY CO-AUTHOR
FOR THE KILLINGS THEORY IS MARTIN DUGARD.
THERE ARE 9 MILLION COPIES TO THESE BOOKS IN PRINT.
DUGARD HAS A NEW BOOK OUT TODAY CALLED "THE EXPLORERS" ABOUT MEN
OVERCOMING AMAZING HARDSHIPS TO CHART THE EARTH, SPECIFICALLY
THE NILE. IF YOU ARE A HISTORY BUFF YOU’RE
GOING TO LOVE THIS BOOK. FACTOR TIP OF THE DAY.
>>> THAT IS IT FOR US TONIGHT. PLEASE CHECK OUT THE FOX NEWS
FACTOR WEBSITE WHICH IS DIFFERENT FROM BILL O’REILLY.COM
AND SPOUT OFF ABOUT THE FACTOR.
